alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN PHELPS... NORTHWESTERN KEARNEY...CENTRAL BUFFALO AND SOUTHWESTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Hazard to near Amherst to near Funk. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kearney, Odessa, Pleasanton, and Riverdale around 330 PM CDT. Hazard around 335 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 260 and 278. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
